name: Splunk Attack Analyzer
description: The Splunk Attack Analyzer (SAA) Polarity Integration searches the SAA API for Attack Chain data for Domains, URLs, IPs, SHA256 Hashes and MD5 Hashes for phishing related activity and a Score Assessment.

options.name: API Url
options.description: API Url for Splunk Attack Analyzer (SAA) allows searching indicators via the SAA API

options.name: API Key
options.description: Splunk Attack Analyzer API Key that supports searching via the SAA API.

options.name: Enable URL Submission
options.description: If checked, the integration will support submitting URLs to Splunk Attack Analyzer for any searched URLs.
